message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.MM

This paper deals with computer vision tasks such as depth estimation and semantic segmentation using deep learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel cross-task loss function, which involves training a network to learn a common feature representation for both tasks. This suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper deals with unsupervised training using geometry, which may place it in the sub-category of cs.RO (Robotics). Finally, the paper uses images as input, which may also place it in the sub-category of cs.MM (Multimedia).
